description: LinkedIn posts from Joe Yeong to display on the news page. Add post URLs here to update the display.

how_to_add_posts: 2. Find a post that Joe Yeong shared (not just liked/reposted)
3. Click on the post to open it
4. Copy the URL from the browser address bar
5. Add the URL to the 'posts' array below
instructions.note: Only original posts (not reposts) will display properly with LinkedIn embeds

posts.description: Year in Review - Bernard A. Fox PhD connection
